apptocsinglepage.author: Author
apptocsinglepage.competenciesTooltip: Competency: Set of demonstrable characteristics and skills that enable and improve the efficiency of performing a job. Behavioural competencies describe the key values and strengths that help an official perform effectively in a range of roles. Domain competencies are defined for a specific MDO (for example, the Ministry of Personnel or the Department of Biotechnology) but that does not mean that others will not need them. Functional competencies are common among many domains, cutting across MDOs, as well as roles and activities.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.missionDescription: Mission Karmayogi - National Programme for Civil Services Capacity Building has been envisioned by the Government to address the changing needs and aspiration of the citizen. The Programme has been designed to enhance the civil services under a national Programme, anchored by an apex body headed by the  Prime Minister.
faq.hubDescription: iGOT Karmayogi platform enables officials to explore, acquire and certify their competencies that are critical to discharging their duties. The platform also helps them connect and collaborate across silos and become more efficient in the execution of their responsibilities. These are made possible, with a series of features organized into specific hubs.
faq.accountTitle: How can I reset my password?
faq.accountDescription: You can reset or change your password by clicking on the 'Forgot password' link. An email will be sent to you through which you will be able to reset or change your password.
faq.panelDetails: How can I edit my details?
faq.panelHeader: 'You can edit your profile details by the following steps: 1. Click on 'View profile' button in the profile dropdown.2. Click on the 'Edit profile' button 3. make the necessary changes and click on the 'Save details' button. Please note that few profile details will be updated only after it is approved by the admin.'
faq.portalAccessQ: How can I know what are the various portals I have access to?
faq.portalAccessA: In your profile dropdown menu, you can see the list of all other portals that you have access to.
faq.learnHeader: Learnhub is one among the many hubs that facilitates competency building through suitable courses, assessments and learning recommendations (i.e. CBPs).
faq.cbpDescription: Competency Building Product (CBP) is a content comprising of resources, course, modules and programs which can be consumed by the government officials to enhance their competencies or acquire new ones.
faq.cbpHowtitle: How can I search for a CBP?
faq.cbpHowDescription: 'You can search for a CBP through various ways: 1. Search a CBP by name 2. Explore by topics 3. Explore by competencies 4. Explore by topics'
faq.cbpWhereTitle: Where can I see all the newly added CBPs?
faq.cbpWhereDesc: You can view all the newly added CBPs under the 'Newly added course' section in the homepage.
faq.cbpPanelDescription: After selecting the CBP that you want to learn, click on the 'Start' button.
faq.resumePassCBPA: Yes, you can pause a CBP that you are currently consuming and resume at any point of time.
faq.assessmentQuery: Is it necessary to pass an assessment?
faq.assesmentAnswer: It is necessary to pass the CBP assessment for you to acquire the competency that the CBP caters to.
faq.competencyAssessmentAns: Every competency will have assessments attached to it and only after passing the assessment with minimun required score, you will be able to acquire the competency and attached it to you competency list
faq.cbpCreatorAns: The CBPs are created by the CBP providers through the CBP portal which is listed after going through a review process.
faq.discussQue: How can I use the discuss forum?
faq.discussQueAns: The discuss hub enables you to post your query, idea or suggestion which will be visible to all officials on the platform. Other officials can then engage with your post, provide necessary information and guide the official
faq.discussPostAns: Any official who have been onboarded to the iGOT Karmayogi platform will be able to view and engage with your post.
faq.discussDeletePostAns: Yes, you will be able to edit or delete your post by clicking on the ellipses in the post.
faq.discussQuickAccessPostQ: How can I get quick access to a post?
faq.discussQuickAccessPostA: You can bookmark a post to save it. Additionally, you can search for a post by selecting the right caterogy or tag.
faq.discussHowHubHelp: How can discuss hub help me?
faq.discussHowHubHelpAns: Discuss hub provides officials with an opportunity to benefit from insights from previous discussions and to trigger new conversations around particular queries they may have.
faq.networkConnAns: Connections are the people (governement officials) who you are connected to in the iGOT platform. Your connections will be able to see the posts you have made, your profile details, your activites until you mark those as private.
faq.competenciesTitleWhere: Where can I see my competencies?
faq.competenciesTitleWhereAns: You can see the competencies that you have acquired and the list of recommended competencies in the Competency hub.
faq.competenciesHubAns: Competency hub is one of the key hubs in the iGOT platform detailing about the recommended competencies for your position and your acquired competencies thus giving information about your competency gap.
faq.competencyAcquire: How can I acquire a competency?
faq.competencyAcquireAns: You can acquire a competency by consuming CBP and taking up the CBP assessments catering to that competencies, taking up the competency assessment. WPCAS and PIAA will also be required in the future to acquire a competency.
faq.competencyA: Competency is defined as a combination of attitudes, skills and knowledge (ASK) that enable an individual to perform a task or activity successfully in a given job. There are three types of competencies – Behavioural, Domain and Functional
faq.wpacsAnswer: An official's Workplace Competency Assessment Score (WPCAS) is constructed from their colleagues’ (peers, subordinates, and superiors) assessments about their performance. Through these assessments, an official’s colleagues are provided the opportunity to examine the extent to which he/she is demonstrating a particular competency in the workplace. For each competency an official is supposed to have, his/her colleagues receive questions where they are asked to indicate how he/she performed recently on that competency. The responses to these questions are then collated to create a single score for each competency every 3 months. The assessments also serve the purpose of providing feedback to help officials improve their performance.
faq.cbpCompetencyStoreAns: This score will be given to a learner on the completion of a CBP and its corresponding assessments. It is based on the learner’s performance on these assessments and contributes to the TCS (thereby the overall competency score of an individual).
faq.frcCAns: The Framework of Roles, Activities and Competencies (FRAC), as termed within Mission Karmayogi’s Integrated Government Online Training platform (iGOT) initiative, is the mapping of three constructs (roles, activities and competencies, supported by knowledge resources) for each individual position within all government ministries, departments and organisations (MDOs) at the national, state and local level.
faq.workOrderA: Work allocation orders are documents which formally allocate the roles and accountabilities to every government official, usually upon joining. These are allocated by the supervisor or Head of the MDO, and updated as and when necessary.
faq.whatKpDes: Karma Points measure and map a government officer's engagement on the iGOT Karmayogi platform to encourage them in their learning and competency-building journey.
faq.whyKp: Why do I need Karma Points?
faq.whyKpDesc: Good question! All learners need to know how they progress in their journeys. They need neutral feedback and encouragement so that they can give their best. Karma Points help learners keep track of their journey and motivate them to engage with the platform.
faq.howCanEarnKp: How can I earn Karma Points?
faq.howCanEarnKpDesc: Easy! You can earn Karma Points through various actions on iGOT, such as registering and logging in, completing courses, clearing assessments, completing courses under your Capacity Building Plans (ask your MDO Admin or iGOT Nodal Officer for details), and providing feedback on completed courses through ratings.
faq.howKpCalDes: Simple! You get Karma Points from your first engagement – through one-time actions like self-registration on iGOT. After registering and logging into iGOT, continuous actions, such as completing courses or clearing assessments, also grant learners Karma Points. These meaningful actions are measured, added, and converted into your Karma Points.
faq.registerKp: I registered and logged in to iGOT. How many Karma Points do I receive?
faq.registerKpDesc: Great question! If you self-register and log in to iGOT, you will receive 5 Karma Points instantly. However, if you are onboarded through your Ministry or Department, you will not receive those 5 Karma Points. Don’t worry! You have many opportunities to earn lots of Karma Points! Enroll in a course to begin your journey!
faq.selfRegister: Will I receive Karma Points for self-registration?
faq.selfRegisterDesc: Yes! If you self-register, you will receive 5 Karma Points!
faq.nonSelfRegister: Will I receive Karma Points if I have been registered through my Ministry, Department, or Organisation?
faq.nonSelfRegisterDesc: Unfortunately, you will not earn Karma Points if you have been registered through your Ministry, Department, or Organisation. Don’t worry! You have many opportunities to earn lots of Karma Points! Enroll in a course to begin your journey!
faq.passAssisment: Will I earn Karma Points for passing assessments?
faq.passAssismentDesc: Yes! You earn 5 Karma Points each time you pass an assessment, which is course related.
faq.assessmentsComplete: Will I get Karma Points for assessments, even for courses without assessments?
faq.assessmentsCompleteDesc: No. For courses that do not have assessments, you will only get Karma Points for completing the course. In the long term, all courses will have assessments.
faq.rating: Does rating earn me Karma Points?
faq.ratingDesc: Yes, you will receive 2 Karma Points each time you rate.
faq.enrolling: Will I be awarded Karma Points for enrolling in a course every time?
faq.enrollingDesc: No, you will earn only 5 Karma Points for your first course enrollment.
faq.everyLogin: Will I be awarded Karma Points for logging into iGOT every time?
faq.everyLoginDesc: No, you will earn 5 Karma Points for your first log-in only.
faq.cbpAfterComplate: What happens if I complete a course that later gets mandated in my Capacity Building Plan?
faq.cbpAfterComplateDesc: No problem. You can click on “Claim Your +10 Karma Points” to be rewarded with additional Karma Points once a course is mandated as part of your Capacity Building Plan.
faq.cbpAdditionalKp: Will I receive additional Karma Points for courses re-mandated as part of my Capacity Building Plan?
faq.cbpAdditionalKpDesc: No, you will receive 10 Karma Points only for the first time you complete a course, even if it is re-mandated later.
faq.noCbp: How many Karma Points will I be awarded for completing courses outlined in my Capacity Building Plan within the stipulated time?
faq.noCbpDesc: You will gain 10 additional Karma Points for completing mandated courses within the stipulated time frame, as outlined in your Ministry’s or Department’s Capacity Building Plans. With the 5 Karma Points you earn for completing a course, you receive a total of 15 Karma Points for completing a course within your Capacity Building Plan.
faq.noComplete: Will my Karma Points be affected if I don't complete mandatory courses under my Capacity Building Plan within the stipulated time?
faq.noCompleteDesc:
Yes, your Karma Points will be affected if you don't complete a course under your Capacity Building Plan within the stipulated time. One Karma Point will be deducted for each month of delay. For instance, if you need to complete a course by 31st January but complete it on 28th March, you will receive 10 - 2 = 8 Karma Points.
These points will be in addition to the 5 Karma Points you receive for completing the course.
faq.limtKp: Is there a limit on the number of Karma Points I can earn?
faq.limtKpDesc: Yes, there is a limit on the number of Karma Points you can earn. Each month, you can earn Karma Points for 4 courses. However, this limit only applies to courses outside your Capacity Building Plan. There is no limit on the number of Karma Points you can earn for your Capacity Building Plan courses
faq.howOftenKpUpdate: How often are Karma Points updated?
faq.howOftenKpUpdateDesc: Almost in real time! Karma Points are updated within 0 to 4 hours, allowing you to track your progress. A three-month history is also accessible by clicking on the Karma Points widget.
faq.trackKp: Where can I track my Karma Points?
faq.trackKpDesc: You can view your Karma Points on the iGOT home page, which is updated within 0 to 4 hours. Clicking on the Karma Points widget shows a three-month history of activities contributing to your score.
faq.mechanismForcalculatingKp: Is the mechanism for calculating Karma Points fixed?
faq.mechanismForcalculatingKpDesc: No! iGOT is a dynamic platform that will keep evolving with your feedback toward the goal of a Viksit Bharat. Similarly, the calculation of Karma Points will keep evolving with the platform's growth.
faq.whatLearnerLeaderDes: The Learner Leaderboard is a mechanism to recognize the highest-performing learners in a Ministry/Department/Organization.
faq.purposeOfLeaderboard: What is the purpose of the Learner Leaderboard?
faq.purposeOfLeaderboardDesc: The Learner Leaderboard is designed to encourage a culture of continuous learning and participation of learners by showcasing the top learners within a Ministry/Department/Organization.
faq.howCanCalculate: How is the Learner Leaderboard calculated?
faq.howCanCalculateDesc: The Learner Leaderboard is calculated based on the Karma Points earned by a learner in a particular calendar month.
faq.whenItUpdates: When is the Learner Leaderboard updated?
faq.whenItUpdatesDes: The Learner Leaderboard is updated on the 1st of every month based on the Karma Points earned in the previous calendar month by the learner.
faq.willItVisibleToAll: Will the Learner Leaderboard be visible to every Ministry/Department/Organization?
faq.willItVisibleToAllDesc:
Yes, it will be shown to all MDOs (Ministries/Departments/Organizations) except
  • Users belonging to MDOs without an MDO Admin.
  • Users belonging to MDOs with an MDO Admin but with less than 10 users in that MDO.
faq.howItHelps: How is the Learner Leaderboard going to help a user's learning journey?
faq.howItHelpsDesc: Learner Leaderboard aims to recognize and motivate the top learners within an MDO (Ministry/Department/Organization), and thus enhance learner engagement of MDOs on the platform.
faq.whatDisplayInLeaderboard: What does the Learner Leaderboard display?
faq.whatDisplayInLeaderboardDesc: The Learner Leaderboard displays the 'Top Karmayogis' of the Ministry/Department/Organization in the previous month.
faq.willGiveRealTimeUpdate: Will the Learner Leaderboard give real-time updates?
faq.willGiveRealTimeUpdateDesc: No, the Learner Leaderboard is not updated on a real-time basis. It is updated on the 1st of every month.
faq.otherTool: Is there any other tool apart from Karma Points used to calculate the Learner Leaderboard?
faq.otherToolDesc: No, the Learner Leaderboard will only be calculated based on the Karma Points earned, and the learners will be ranked accordingly.
faq.howNotifyToLeaner: How does the Learner Leaderboard notify learners of changes in rank?
faq.howNotifyToLeanerDesc: A congratulatory message will show up on the learners' interface only if there is a positive change in their rank after the Learner Leaderboard gets updated for that month.
faq.howItRaked: How will learners with equal Karma Points be ranked?
faq.howItRakedDesc: Learners with identical Karma Points will be ranked alphabetically, sharing the same rank.

profileKarmapoints.tooltip: Karma Points are a reward for a high learning engagement activity at iGOT. This section displays your point collection history for the past three months only. For more information visit Karma Points FAQs.
profileKarmapoints.karmaPointHistoryMessage: Karma Points history is available for last 3 months only.

appKarmapointsPanel.afterRate: Congrats! You've rated the course and earned
appKarmapointsPanel.firstEnrollTip: Note: This is only applicable for your first enrolment.
appKarmapointsPanel.courseCompleteTip: Every course completion automatically gets you 5 Karma Points.
appKarmapointsPanel.rateTip: Your course rating serves as a valuable recommendation to Karmayogis, so go ahead and RATE.
appKarmapointsPanel.assessmentTip: Here's 5 extra Karma Points for successfully completing all final assessments
appKarmapointsPanel.acbpTip: Additionally, passing all final assessments will earn you an extra 5 Karma Points. Remember, it's essential to stick to the schedule outlined in your Capacity Building Plan, as it directly impacts your Karma Points. For further details, please refer to the FAQs.
appKarmapointsPanel.completeBeforeText: Congrats! You've completed the course and earned
appKarmapointsPanel.completeAfterText: for each course you complete, with a limit of four non-My iGOT courses per month.
appKarmapointsPanel.completeTip: For every My iGOT course you complete (as per ACBP), you will earn 15 Karma Points. For every other course you complete, you will earn 5 Karma Points, up to a maximum of four courses per month. Start learning and watch your Karma grow!
appKarmapointsPanel.acbpCompleteTip: Course completion earns you 15 Karma Points. Additionally, successfully completing all final assessments gets you 5 extra Karma Points.

publicHome.mainSectionContentDesc: Gain skills to rocket your career growth. Connect with civil servants and experts to learn and discover new opportunities in the Indian civil services.
publicHome.learnAndNetwork: Learn and network with civil servants and subject matter experts across India
publicHome.serviceHeading: How does the platform enable you to become the best version of yourself?
publicHome.journeySectionPara: Are you a government official without an iGOT Karmayogi account yet? Start here.
publicHome.learnhubPara: Learn anywhere, anytime and bridge your competency gaps using impactful and engaging learning content.
publicHome.ServiceItemDiscussion: Discuss and learn with peers, colleagues, civil servants and experts across the country.
publicHome.networkHubParagraph: Connect with civil servants across the country. Grow your network within government circles.
publicHome.competencyHubPara: Identify your competency requirements, competency gaps, so you can grow faster in the right direction.
publicHome.careerHubPara: Explore career opportunities across the country and signal your expertise.
publicHome.eventHubPara: Join online and in-person events to break silos and share ideas.
publicHome.walkthroughIgot: Walkthrough of the iGOT Karmayogi Portal
publicHome.igotWalkthrough: Gain skills to rocket your career growth. Connect with civil servants and experts to learn and discover new opportunities in the Indian civil services.
publicHome.growSection: Learn. Network. Take your career growth to the next level.

profileNudge.slot1Info1: Rise and shine, start your day with a dose of knowledge.
profileNudge.slot1Info2: Get a head start with a burst of learning.
profileNudge.slot1Info3: Morning learning, morning growth! Make the most of your hours by expanding your skills.
profileNudge.slot1Info4: Brighten your morning with learning! Seize the day and unlock your potential.
profileNudge.slot1Info5: Elevate your morning routine, with a quick dose of learning. Did you know iGOT has 850+ courses?
profileNudge.slot2Info1: Explore our new courses and expand your knowledge today.
profileNudge.slot2Info2: Working hard? Take a break, update your profile - if you haven't.
profileNudge.slot2Info3: Unlock new achievements by mastering challenging topics.
profileNudge.slot2Info4: Hooray! 50 lakh+ courses conquered by our amazing 30 lakh+ iGOT learners! Let's keep the learning spirit alive!
profileNudge.slot2Info5: Be a catalyst for growth! Spread the word about iGOT to your colleagues and ignite their learning journey! Together, we can achieve more!
profileNudge.slot3Info1: Had lunch? Now feed your mind with a bite of knowledge.
profileNudge.slot3Info2: Time to check what courses are trending in across ministries and departments!
profileNudge.slot3Info3: Make the most of your afternoon: invest in skill building, and explore our courses for personal and professional growth.
profileNudge.slot3Info4: Together, we've achieved 70 lakh+ course enrolments! Here's to many more milestones ahead!
profileNudge.slot3Info5: Share the learning love! Motivate your colleagues to explore iGOT and expand their skill sets.
profileNudge.slot4Info1: Invest in yourself. Do a mandatory course on the iGOT mobile app.
profileNudge.slot4Info2: Finished work? Join the iGOT social media community - on LinkedIn, X, YouTube, Instagram, Facebook and Spotify.!
profileNudge.slot4Info3: Congratulations! You belong to the world's largest community of government e-Learners.
profileNudge.slot4Info4: Chai o'clock! Stay ahead in your career journey.
profileNudge.slot4Info5: Lead by example! Show your colleagues the power of learning with iGOT.
profileNudge.slot5Info1: Invest your evening in career growth. Explore new iGOT courses.
profileNudge.slot5Info2: Relaxing after dinner? Watch Karmayogi Talks at the Events Hub
profileNudge.slot5Info4: Evening enlightenment awaits! Unwind with valuable lessons - transform your evenings into a sanctuary of knowledge.
profileNudge.slot6Info1: Utilize quiet hours for personal development. Start a course now!
profileNudge.slot6Info2: Invest in your growth while the world sleeps. Do a Domain course.
profileNudge.slot6Info3: Late-night learners, your time is now!
profileNudge.slot6Info4: Golden hours for golden insights! Harness the power of late nights to absorb knowledge like never before.
profileNudge.slot6Info5: The world sleeps, but knowledge never rests. Make every moment count with iGOT's career enhancing resources

termsandcondition.p1VisitorAccess: Any visitor  who accesses or establishes a connection ('User') to the iGOT Karmayogi Platform  located at 2nd Floor, NDCC-II Building, Near CP, Opposite to Jantar Mantar, Delhi 110001or any services, including mobile applications provided in connection with this website (collectively 'the Platform'), which are currently owned and managed by Karmayogi Bharat, shall read, understand and agree to following terms and conditions of use.
termsandcondition.p2UserRegistered: If the User has registered for or on behalf of an entity or visits the Platform on behalf of an entity, it is deemed that the User has accepted the following terms and conditions and other policies of the Platform on behalf of that entity.
termsandcondition.p3PlatformTraining: Whereas, the Platform provides training information, material and content; and WHEREAS, the User is keen to know, use, operate and learn from the training information, material, and content made available on the Platform; and WHERAS, the Platform and the User acknowledge that the training information, material, and content on the Platform is made available by various entities, including government departments, and private entities such as schools, institutes, teaching professionals, business entities (collectively “the Service Providers”) and that the Platform is used for aggregation of all the information, material, and content at one place for the convenience of the User; and
termsandcondition.p4UserAcceptanceOnAge: Whereas, the user agrees that by using the platform user represent that user is at least 18 years old and that user is legally competent and therefore, with the intention to be bound legally, it is hereby agreed and understood by the user that:
termsandcondition.p5UserTermsAndConditions: In order to constitute as an authorized user of the Platform, the User agrees to abide by all the terms and conditions mentioned herein. User is solely responsible for availing the trainings on the Platform and/or for using the service provided by Service Providers and shall ensure that such use complies fully with the provisions mentioned herein.
termsandcondition.p6UserPrivacyPolicy: The Platform respects the privacy of the User and permits the User to control the treatment of their personal information. A complete statement of the current privacy policy pertaining to the Platform can be found by clicking
termsandcondition.p8Agrees: and User agrees to abide by the same.
termsandcondition.p9PlatformRights: The Platform reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend, alter, add, delete any or all of the provisions of these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be notified to the User by posting them on the Platform or through other reasonable means of providing notice. Any changes to the present terms and conditions will be effective immediately upon notice to User. Use of the Platform by the User after a notice of changes has been published will be deemed as acceptance of the changes by the User.
termsandcondition.p10PlatformMayChange: It is stated that any aspect, content, or feature of the trainings and/or services on the Platform, as well as any aspect pertaining to the use of the Platform may be changed, limited, or discontinued at any time.
termsandcondition.p11userSatisfaction: If the user does not agree to the present terms and conditions or is not satisfied with the platform, the user should discontinue the use of the platform and shall write their query to the contact details mentioned below
termsandcondition.p12PlatformCopyright: The Platform is protected by copyright, trademark, and other applicable intellectual property and proprietary rights laws and is owned, controlled, and/or licensed by the Platform manager or respective Service Providers. The iGOT Karmayogi logo is a trademark of Karmayogi Bharat. All other trademarks appearing on the Platform are the property of their respective owners/ Service Providers and any use of any such logo or mark without prior written permission of the owner shall attract relevant legal ramifications.
termsandcondition.p13UserUsesOnContent: User will make no other use of the content without the express written permission of the Platform, the copyright owner or its authorized agent. User will not modify, publish, distribute, transmit, participate in the transfer or sale, create derivative works, or in any way exploit, commercially or otherwise, any of the content, in whole or in part, found on the Platform that was not expressly created by User itself. User agrees that User do not acquire any ownership rights in the Platform or over any downloaded content. User further agrees that all rights in the Platform and any of the content found on the Platform not expressly granted to User is expressly reserved to the owner and/or its licensors/ authorized Service Providers.
termsandcondition.p14UserUsesPlatformContent: User will use the Platform and any content, material, or information found on the Platform solely for lawful purposes. User shall not upload to, distribute to, or otherwise disseminate through the Platform any material or information of any kind that is defamatory, abusive, obscene, or otherwise violates any law or infringes or violates any rights of any other person or entity, or contains a solicitation of funds, advertising, or a solicitation for goods or services.
termsandcondition.p17NaturalPersonAccess: Be a natural person to access or seek to access the Platform and its Services;
termsandcondition.p18NotPermittedToOtherPerson: Not permit any other person to use the User's username and password; keep the User’s account username, password, at all times and not disclose password to anyone else;
termsandcondition.p19NotAccessLink: Not access or link to or seek to access or link to (either directly or indirectly) any other User’s 's Platform account;
termsandcondition.p20reportHelpdesk: Report the HelpDesk immediately if the User suspects that the security of his/her account may have been compromised e.g.: password or username has been lost or stolen. Contact Platform using the details at Contact Us;
termsandcondition.p21EnsurePersonalAndProfileDetails: Ensure personal and profile details are accurate and kept up to date with the Platform;
termsandcondition.p22UnderstandUserResponsibility: Understand that the User is solely responsible for any use of the account using his/her username and password, whether or not such use has been authorized by the User
termsandcondition.p23KarmyogiPlatformResponsibility: Unless stated otherwise, Karmayogi Bharat or the Platform do not claim ownership of the content a Service Provider publishes on the Platform. After publishing of the content, the Service Provider shall continue to retain all ownership to the content, subject to the license terms described.
termsandcondition.p24WarnedMaterialInfo: It is warranted that any material or information that is available on the Platform, including, for example, any training material, exam or assessment questions, documents, presentation or related content, is lawful content of the Service Providers and that the Platform and the Service Provider have all necessary rights to create, use, modify, and publish the material or information or training. User will be liable for any damage resulting from User making any material or information available through the Platform to non-authorized Users.
termsandcondition.p25EffortsOnAccuracy: Though all efforts have been made to ensure the accuracy and currency of the content on the Platform, the same should not be construed as a statement of law or used for any legal purposes. In case of any ambiguity or doubts, Users are advised to verify/check with the concerned Ministry/Department/Organization and/or other source(s), and to obtain appropriate professional advice.
termsandcondition.p28LinksToOtherWebPortal: At many places on the Platform, the User shall find links to other websites/portals. These links have been placed for the convenience of the User. The Platform is not responsible for the contents of the linked websites and does not necessarily endorse the views expressed in them. Mere presence of the link or its listing on the Platform should not be assumed as endorsement of any kind. The Platform cannot guarantee that these links will work all the time and have no control over availability of linked destinations.
termsandcondition.p29LinksByOtherPlatform: Links to the Platform by other websites/portals
termsandcondition.p30LinkInfoOnPlatform: The User shall be free link the information on the Platform to other websites. However, the Platform needs to be informed about any links provided to it so that User can be informed of any changes or updates therein. Also, the Platform does not permit its pages to be loaded into frames on any other website. The pages belonging to the Platform must load into a newly opened browser window of the User.
termsandcondition.p31ContentOnPlatform: The Content on the Platform is for the use by the Users only and not for commercial exploitation. A User may not decompile, reverse engineer, disassemble, rent, lease, loan, sell, sublicense, or create derivative works from the Platform. Nor may User use any network monitoring or discovery software to determine the site architecture, or extract information about usage, individual identities or users. A User will not use any robot, spider, other automatic software or device, or manual process to monitor or copy the Platform without the Platform’s prior written permission. A User will not copy, modify, reproduce, republish, distribute, display, or transmit for commercial, non-profit or public purposes all or any portion of the Platform, except to the extent permitted by the copyright policy of this terms of use. Any unauthorized use of the Platform is prohibited. The use of any software (e.g. bots, scraper tools) or other automatic devices to access, monitor or copy the Platform is prohibited unless expressly authorized by the Platform in writing
termsandcondition.p32PlatformAndManager: The Platform and its managers have no obligation to, and do not and cannot review every item of material or information that Service Provider make available through the Platform and are not responsible for any content of this material or information. However, the Platform reserves the right to delete, move, or edit any material or information that it deems, in its sole discretion, unacceptable, defamatory, abusive, or otherwise in violation of any law or that infringes or violates any rights of any other person or entity. Further, the Platform reserves the right, at all times, to disclose any material or information as necessary to satisfy any law, regulation, or governmental request.
termsandcondition.p33UserAgreement: User expressly agrees that use of the Service and the Platform is at the sole risk of the User. Neither the Platform nor any of its managers, employees, agents, distributors, third party content providers, or licensors (and their respective directors, officers, employees, and agents) warrant that the service or the Platform will be compatible on all devices or operating systems, uninterrupted or error free or that they will be free of viruses or other harmful components nor do they make any warranty as to the results that may be obtained from the use of the Platform or as to the accuracy, reliability, completeness, or contents of any content, information, material, postings, or posting responses found on the Platform, or any services provided through the Platform, or any links to other sites or services made available on the Platform.
termsandcondition.p34CoursesTrainings: The courses, trainings, all content, material, information, found on the platform, are provided on an 'as is' basis without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied. To the maximum extent permitted by law, the Platform makes no representations or warranties about the validity, accuracy, correctness, reliability, quality, stability, completeness or correctness of any information provided on or through the Platform or on any of the external links that are made available on the Platform. The Platform makes no representation that the services or training providing over the Platform would guarantee any promotions, advancements, raise, etc., professionally or academically.
termsandcondition.p35TermsAndCondContrary: Notwithstanding anything in the terms and conditions to the contrary, under no circumstances, including, but not limited to negligence, the Platform or its managers, any of its affiliates, assignees, successors-in-interest, employees, agents, distributors, third party content providers, partners, licensees, licensors, or sponsors or any of their respective directors, officers, employees, agents and independent contractors be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special or consequential damages, losses or expenses arising out of or relating to the use of, the misuse of, or the inability to use, any content, information, material, modules, features, links or other elements on the Platform or any failure of performance, error, omission, interruption, inconvenience, unauthorized access, defect, incorrect sequencing, delay in operation or transmission, virus, configuration or compatibility problem, or line or system failure. These limitations apply regardless of whether the party liable or allegedly liable was advised, had other reason to know, or in fact knew of the possibility of such damages, losses or expenses. User specifically acknowledge and agree that the Platform and/or any of its officers will not be liable for any defamatory, offensive or illegal conduct of any User.
termsandcondition.p36MaximumExtentPermit: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, User will defend, indemnify and hold harmless the Platform and any of its managers, parts, subsidiaries, affiliates, employees, agents, distributors, third party content providers, or licensors (and their respective directors, officers, employees, and agents)) from and against all claims, liability, and expenses, including attorneys' fees and legal fees and costs, arising out of use of the Platform and/or breach of any provision of the terms and conditions. The Platform reserves the right, in its sole discretion and at its own expense, to assume the exclusive defense and control of any matter otherwise subject to indemnification by User. User will cooperate as fully as reasonably required in the defense of any claim.
termsandcondition.p37SubmissionOnPlatform: Any submissions made on the Platform by the User for assessment or for any other purpose, shall be the sole responsibility of the User and the User shall ensure that all submissions made on the Platform are compliant with the current terms and conditions. The Platform does not and cannot verify the contents of the submissions by each User and disclaims any liability from any harm, damage, injury, insult, etc., caused by the submission made by the User. In accordance with the Privacy Policy of the Platform and subject to the restrictions mentioned therein, the Platform shall be free to use any information, data, submissions, made by the User.
termsandcondition.p38PlatformMayTerminate: The Platform may terminate the User's use of the Platform, or discontinue the service, at any time for breach of any of the terms and conditions and/or failure to pay for the training course or services. The Platform shall have the right, immediately upon notice, to terminate a User's use of the service in the event of any conduct by User is considered to be unacceptable, or in the event of any breach by the terms and conditions or if User is in violation of any applicable law.
termsandcondition.p39DisputeArising: Any disputes arising out of use of the Platform and the present terms and conditions shall be governed exclusively by the applicable laws of India, irrespective of the location of the User, without giving effect to their conflict of laws principles. User expressly consent to the exclusive jurisdiction, and venue of the Courts of New Delhi, India.
termsandcondition.p40PlatformUserAck: The Platform and the User acknowledge that other generally accepted standard terms and conditions and legal contractual obligations would apply wherever required and in case of any query or feedback for the Platform, User may use the feedback feature on the Platform or visit
termsandcondition.p42Disclaimer: Disclaimer for Content Published on Platform:
termsandcondition.p43ContentPublishedOnPlatform: All content published on Karmayogi platform is provided by various Ministries, Departments and other public and authorised private organisations. The concerned course publishers ensure the accuracy and currency of the content on this platform. Many courses provided by various departments relate to policies, rules, guidelines as applicable on the date of publication of the course.  All courses publishers strive to keep the most updated content, however the latest position of any law, rules, guidelines etc. may be accessed from the website of the concerned Ministries.
termsandcondition.p44GovernmentResponsibility: In no event will the Government of India or Karmayogi Bharat SPV be liable for any expense, loss or damage including, without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any expense, loss or damage whatsoever arising from use, or loss of use, of data, arising out of or in connection with the use of this platform. The platform makes no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability or availability of the published content. Links to other websites that have been included on this platform are provided for convenience only.

privacyPolicy.p1Utilizing: When utilizing the iGOT Karmayogi mobile application or accessing the iGOT Karmayogi website (referred to collectively as 'iGOT Karmayogi'), certain personal information is gathered from and about you. We are dedicated to safeguarding the security of this information and ensuring your privacy. This document ('Privacy Policy') delineates the specifics of the personal information collected, the methods of collection, the entities responsible for collection, and the purposes for which it is utilized.
privacyPolicy.p2Voluntary: To utilize iGOT Karmayogi, you must provide your voluntary, specific, informed, unequivocal, and unambiguous consent to the processing of your personal data for the purposes specified in this Privacy Policy. By installing the Application, you indicate your agreement to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. Subsequently, your continued use of iGOT Karmayogi indicates your ongoing acceptance of the provisions of this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.p3Subject: This Privacy Policy is subject to periodic revisions, and you will be informed of all such modifications. To continue utilizing iGOT Karmayogi, you must consent to the revised terms of the Privacy Policy through explicit affirmative action by updating the App (with the revised Privacy Policy.)
privacyPolicy.p4GovernsTheWay: This Privacy Policy governs the way Karmayogi Bharat collects, uses, maintains, and discloses information collected from users (each, a 'User') of the iGOT Karmayogi. It applies to the App and all products and services offered by Karmayogi Bharat. The policy aims to maintain compliance with Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 and adherence to the security guidelines of Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology, Government of India.
privacyPolicy.p5Personal: We may collect personal identification information from users in various ways, including, but not limited to, when users install the iGOT Karmayogi, register an account, or interact with the iGOT Karmayogi's features. Users may be asked for, as appropriate, name, email address, phone number, address/location and other relevant information about their service with the Government of India as the application is meant for the use of Government officials only and their individuals working for government on contract. The information collected shall be used only for the purpose of reporting and monitoring usage and consumption of courses on the platform by their respective departments.
privacyPolicy.p6Collect: We may collect and use users' personal information for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.p7UserExperience: To personalize user experience: We may use information in the aggregate to understand how our users as a group use the services and resources provided in the iGOT Karmayogi.
privacyPolicy.p8ImproveOurApp: To improve our iGOT Karmayogi: We continually strive to improve our iGOT Karmayogi offerings based on the information and feedback we receive from users.
privacyPolicy.p9PeriodicEmails: To send periodic emails: We may use the email address to respond to inquiries, questions, and/or other requests.
privacyPolicy.p10PhoneNumbers: Phone numbers may be used for sending communications such as SMS, Whatsapp messages, mobile push notifications etc regarding iGOT Karmayogi.
privacyPolicy.p11Adopt: We adopt appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of users' personal information stored in the iGOT Karmayogi.
privacyPolicy.p12Information: All information available with Karmayogi Bharat is classified (based on existing classification of Manual on paper records issued by Ministry of Home Affairs, 1994 and National Information Security Policy and Guidelines 2014 issued by Ministry of Home Affairs as updated from time to time).
privacyPolicy.p13System: System does not share/ disclose any information of the user collected at the time of sign up with any individual or organization (public or private) unless and until it is required by law or it is authorized by the account holder with his/her consent.
privacyPolicy.p14PersonalData: All personal data collected from you under Clause 4 will be retained for as long as your account remains in existence.
privacyPolicy.p15NotWithStanding: Not with standing anything contained herein, iGOT Karmayogi shall retain any personal data or any records pertaining to the processing of personal data for legal and compliance purpose and for logs maintenance.
privacyPolicy.p16ThirdParty: We may use third-party service providers to help us operate our business and the iGOT Karmayogi or administer activities on our behalf, such as sending out newsletters or surveys with approved agencies of Government of India. We may share your information with these third parties for those limited purposes provided that you have given us your permission.
privacyPolicy.p17Karmayogi: Karmayogi Bharat has the discretion to update this Privacy Policy at any time. When we do, we will revise the updated date at the bottom of this page. We encourage users to frequently check this page for any changes to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically and become aware of modifications.
privacyPolicy.p18ByUsingThisApp: By using this iGOT Karmayogi, you signify your acceptance of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to this Privacy Policy, please do not use our iGOT Karmayogi. Your continued use of the iGOT Karmayogi following the posting of changes to this Privacy Policy will be deemed your acceptance of those changes.
privacyPolicy.p19IfYouHave: If you have any grievances in respect of any act or omission by iGOT Karmayogi in the performance of its obligations in relation to your personal data or the exercise of your rights under the provisions of the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023, and the rules made thereunder, you may address your complaint to the Grievance Officer whose business contact information is as follows:
privacyPolicy.karmayogiDopt: Karmayogi Bharat under Department of Personnel and Training (DoPT)
privacyPolicy.p21TheGrievance: The grievance redressal officer will acknowledge receipt of your grievance within 48 hours and shall dispose of your grievance within 2 weeks of such receipt.
privacyPolicy.p22IfYouBelieveThat: If you believe that your grievance was not adequately addressed by the grievance officer you shall be free to make a complaint to the Data Protection Board in accordance with the procedure prescribed in this regard.
privacyPolicy.p23IfYouHaveAnyQuestions: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, the practices of this iGOT Karmayogi, or your dealings with this iGOT Karmayogi, please contact us at

profilehome.roleAndActivitiesDescription: Enter all your roles and activities to complete your profile
profilehome.topicsDescription: Choose the topics of your interest
profilehome.currentCompetenciesDescription: Choose the 'current competencies' you are skilled with
profilehome.desiredCompetenciesDescription: Choose the competencies you desire to possess

welcomeonboard.note: Let us take you through a quick guided onboarding to understand your interests at work. Knowing you better helps us give you a more personalized experience on the platform. This way you discover relevant and useful learning content in the easiest way possible. And don’t worry, you can always update your interests later!

rolesandactivities.roleHeader: Please list down your roles & activities as part of your position
rolesandactivities.rolesDescription: Feel free to enter details in your own words, to the best of your understanding. This information will help us tailor a more personalized experience and add more relevant content on the platform.
rolesandactivities.typeTheActivity: Type the activity and press enter
rolesandactivities.addActivitiesForRole: Add activities you perform as part of this role
rolesandactivities.confirmToDeleteRoles:: Do you want to delete the role and associated activities?

dialogbox.p1Activities: Activities are a set of actions taken to contribute towards the various roles one performs within a position.
dialogbox.p2ActSpeaks: Activities speak directly to the execution capacity of an individual public official by providing details on the mandate of their position, and how it is distinguished from other positions in the government.
dialogbox.p3RoleEnsures: Role: Ensures inclusion and accuracy of facts in vigilance related proposals
dialogbox.p4ChecksLegal: Checks the facts with regards to proposal keeping in mind existing rules, provisions, and legal precedents
dialogbox.p5SuppliesMissing: Supplies missing facts to a proposal if any information is missing
dialogbox.p7Quotes: Quotes previous precedents by referring to existing rules
dialogbox.p8RolesDescribe: Roles describe the overall objective of a group of activities and how they contribute to the position.
dialogbox.p9RolesHelp: Roles help understand the mandate of a position. There could be similar positions across the government, but differentiated by the roles they form. Roles help articulate these distinctions by highlighting why the position exists and how it works towards larger organisational goals and priorities.
dialogbox.p10EnsuresInclusion: Ensures inclusion and accuracy of facts in vigilance proposals.
dialogbox.p11CoordinateStakeholders: Coordinates and manages relationships with various stakeholders
dialogbox.p13CompetenciesCombination: Competencies are a combination of attitudes, skills, and knowledge that enable an individual to perform a task or activity successfully in a given job and roles are the starting point for arriving at them.
dialogbox.p14CompetencyTypes: There are three types of competencies: Behavioural, Functional and Domain
dialogbox.p16ProvideInfo: Providing information on individual requirements from a role
dialogbox.p17IdentifyLearning: Identifying learning and development needs for government officials
dialogbox.p21DescriptionDraft: Description: Drafts and analyses a note, in order, in order to move a proposal for
dialogbox.p22DecisionMaking: decision making on the availability of evidence and existing rules and precedents.
dialogbox.p25DescArticulate: Description: Articulates information to others in a language that is clear, concise, and  easy to understand. It also includes the ability to listen and understand the unspoken feelings and concerns of others.
dialogbox.p26CompetencyLabel: Competency Label: Regulatory and Legal Advisory
dialogbox.p28ProvideAdvice: Description: Provides advice to business and management stakeholders on regulatory compliance and legal matters related to support business decision making

apptopic.noTopicfound: Not finding a topic of your interest?

currentcompetencies.description: Feel free to select the competency and level that you feel match your current skills. This does not need to be exact. This information helps us give you a more personalized experience and provide even more relevant content.

desiredcompetencies.headerForDesiredCompetency: Select competencies you want to possess
desiredcompetencies.description: Feel free to select competencies that you feel will help you improve and deliver better at your workplace. This does not need to be exact. This information helps us give you a more personalized experience and provide even more relevant content.

weeklyclaps.weeklyClapsDesc: Weekly Claps are a fun way to track your engagement on the platform. They reflect your commitment and activity level.
weeklyclaps.whatToDo: How can I maintain my Weekly Claps?
weeklyclaps.engageWithPlatform: engaging on the platform each week to keep your claps.
weeklyclaps.whyDidILoose: Why did I lose my Weekly Claps?
weeklyclaps.ifYouFallShort: If you engage for less than
weeklyclaps.engageRequired: in a week, your Weekly Claps counter resets to zero.

learnerLeaderboard.toolTip: The learner leaderboard is calculated based on the Karma Points earned in a month and updated on the 1st of every month.
learnerLeaderboard.title: Top Karmayogis in your department:
learnerLeaderboard.overlayText1: Your dedication to learning is impressive! Congratulations on reaching the
learnerLeaderboard.overlayText3: levels higher than your previous ranking.
learnerLeaderboard.overlayText3WithSingular: level higher than your previous ranking.

hubsdesc.learnDesc: Sharpen your skills with hundreds-of online courses.
hubsdesc.discussDesc: Have a question? Have an Idea? discuss with your peers.
hubsdesc.networkDesc: Connect with interesting people, see what they are upto.
hubsdesc.careerDesc: Explore career options, grow in the path of your choice.
hubsdesc.competenciesDesc: Add your competencies, see what others are adding.

gyaanKarmayogi.title: Gyaan Karmayogi
gyaanKarmayogi.description: Knowledge repository of policy documents, case studies, best practices, and other learning resources from various stakeholders in the field of governance and public services.
